mapper.select: SELECT p.* FROM sys_user AS u LEFT JOIN sys_user_role AS ur ON u.id = ur.user_id LEFT JOIN sys_role AS r ON r.id = ur.role_id LEFT JOIN sys_role_menu AS rp ON r.id = rp.role_id LEFT JOIN sys_menu AS p ON p.id = rp.permission_id WHERE u.id = #{userId}

SELECT m.permission_code FROM sys_menu AS m left join sys_role_menu rm on m.id = rm.permission_id left join sys_user_role ur on rm.role_id = ur.role_id left join sys_role r on r.id = ur.role_id WHERE ur.id = #{userId}
